summary: the idea of single andi being endgame made me really happy??? probably because almost Every main character in a disney show,...
question: the idea of single andi being endgame made me really happy??? probably because almost Every main character in a disney show, especially the girls, end up in a romantic relationship and that's just Blah to me sometimes
answer: i totally agree! andi is only in middle school, and it seems like everyone is pressuring her to be in a relationship. it’d be a great message for little girls to hear that you don’t need a relationship to be happy. also if terri ended jandi toward the end of the season, this would make the most sense for andi’s endgame (rather than pulling a ship out of nowhere)

reblog.comment: i totally agree! andi is only in middle school, and it seems like everyone is pressuring her to be in a relationship. it’d be a great message for little girls to hear that you don’t need a relationship to be happy. also if terri ended jandi toward the end of the season, this would make the most sense for andi’s endgame (rather than pulling a ship out of nowhere)

blog.name: spaceotter42
blog.title: Tomorrow Starts Today
blog.description: An Andi Mack Journey and other things Disney Channel

summary: Looking Ahead to Andi Mack in October
title: Looking Ahead to Andi Mack in October
body:
by spaceotter42

Descriptions of Andi Mack’s October episodes were recently released, and they show new details that fill in part of the show’s storyline puzzle.  Two new video previews for the show were released after I originally wrote this, so I have incorporated some details from them where relevant

I’ve done several articles in past weeks forecasting and discussing Season 3.  If you would like to read those, please do a search of my blog for “Season 3”.  

The Boys Are Back (Oct. 8) – The “boys” must be Ham and Bowie, possibly also Jonah, returning to town after being away for the summer.  The longer description calls them “beloved family members.”  It’s largely confirmed that Buffy’s crush/boyfriend is Walker.  This episode will include a dream sequence of Bex and Bowie getting married.  Andi is the likely dreamer since one scene shows Jonah’s face superimposed on Bowie’s head, suggesting Andi’s fear about her future with Jonah.  This dream sequence will probably be brief, maybe even at the beginning of the show before the opening title credits are run.

Howling at the Moon Festival (Oct. 15) – Jonah’s “mishap” could be anything.  The preview hints at a possible panic attack.  I think the “special event” to one-up Celia’s sister is Bex and Bowie’s engagement.  Then we have “Andi and Jonah have a heart-to-heart talk about their relationship.”  Oh boy, aren’t we all looking forward to that.  Maybe they will back off being a couple for awhile.

It’s A Dilemna (correct spelling)(Oct. 22) – The purposely incorrect spelling is a puzzle.  Perhaps Bowie’s challenging guitar student has a learning disability or is not disciplined to learn.  Deaf actress Millie Simmonds will appear in a few episodes this season so she could be the guitar student.  The “outing” where the gang is “interrupted” by Walker sounds like something awkward.  It may be Andi’s jealousy of Buffy being with Walker.  Cyrus taking a dance class implies some humor.

Hole in the Wall (Oct. 29) – This title must be derived from Bowie literally knocking a hole in the wall to enlarge Bex and Andi’s apartment.  The wording of “for their whole family to live in” implies Bowie will soon be married to Bex.  Buffy’s tryouts for her girls’ basketball team could be challenging if the team is not as skillful as she hopes.

reblog.comment:

summary: what i really want
body:
what i really want

i would love it if terri minsky decided to pull the rug out from under the jandi shippers/younger viewers in the last couple episodes since this is most likely the last season and views would be objectively less important. whether she gave us wandi, ambi, bandi, or if she left andi single, it would still be exponentially better than jandi.

blog.description: glo | she/her | 20 | asian-american | vidder | multifandom af | sidebar: dailyjtvgifs | icon: rafael-solano

summary: Nothing is confirmed and we all just have theories/speculations right now but looking at it from a writer’s standpoint, making...
body:
Nothing is confirmed and we all just have theories/speculations right now but looking at it from a writer’s standpoint, making TJ jealous by bringing in a new character to spend time with Cyrus is a great plot device for him to realize his feelings. Also, other people have pointed this out but in the promo, Andi is looking all hurt/jealous from seeing Jonah/Mille’s character then it immediately cuts to TJ looking jealous at Cyrus/Blondie, so it’s just the way Disney promoted it is what makes me believe TJ is jealous bc they wouldn’t willingly manipulate TJ looking jealous in their promos unless that’s what’s actually happening.

So yeah… those are just my final thoughts on that whole scene. I made too many posts about this but this is it. This is where I stand, my final conclusion.

So yeah… those are just my final thoughts on that whole scene. I made too many posts about this but this is it. This is where I stand, my final conclusion.

Also, other people have pointed this out but in the promo, Andi is looking all hurt/jealous from seeing Jonah/Mille’s character then it immediately cuts to TJ looking jealous at Cyrus/Blondie, so it’s just the way Disney promoted it is what makes me believe TJ is jealous bc they wouldn’t willingly manipulate TJ looking jealous in their promos unless that’s what’s actually happening.

So yeah… those are just my final thoughts on that whole scene. I made too many posts about this but this is it. This is where I stand, my final conclusion.

Also, other people have pointed this out but in the promo, Andi is looking all hurt/jealous from seeing Jonah/Mille’s character then it immediately cuts to TJ looking jealous at Cyrus/Blondie, so it’s just the way Disney promoted it is what makes me believe TJ is jealous bc they wouldn’t willingly manipulate TJ looking jealous in their promos unless that’s what’s actually happening.

summary: tyrus is toxic!!!
title: tyrus is toxic!!!
body:
ok y’all hear me out. i get that like a lot of people ship tyrus but like! it’s kinda..toxic.

buffy and tj aren’t even really chill with each other. like?? and cyrus is just gonna get with him? only problems in the future

tj pushes cyrus waaay too far our of his comfort zone and that’s just a no no

im rooting for blondie boy all the way, let’s get this bread!
